title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI (text UI) client for chatting with Ollama models in the terminal.

title: oll4ma (OpenAI-compatible proxy)
summary: Lightweight proxy that exposes Ollama with an OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with documents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for function-calling, vision, fine-tuning, Docker, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module wrapping Ollama JS client for dependency-injected LLM services.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama (sync/async, Kotlin coroutines, Spring Boot starter).

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter that adds an OpenAI-like chat endpoint backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on notes and insert completions.

title: ollama-chat-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Async Telegram bot that lets groups chat with any Ollama model privately.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot adding slash commands to spawn threaded chats with Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.
